name: GUNCHUCKS!!!
description:
GUNCHUCKS!!! Nunchucks that are also guns!

You play Chuck, a master of Gun Fu! Zombies stole your favorite Gun Fu trophy! It's up to you and your mastery of your trusty GUNCHUCKS to get it back!

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Left Click to shoot and Right Click to melee, space to jump.

(My power went out for over 4 hours today so pardon the lack of music and polish)
